0.0.6.title: feat: integrate notification system and update app structure
changes: Added NotificationProvider and NotificationToast components for handling notifications.
Updated App component to include SafeAreaProvider for better layout management.
Introduced NotificationSettingsScreen for user notification preferences.
Enhanced JournalScreen to check and trigger notifications based on user activity.
Updated version to 0.0.6 and adjusted related dependencies in package.json and package-lock.json.
Minor adjustments to audio playback time calculations in EntryComposer and EntryDetailScreen.
